item.description: installation brew install neovim brew install font-hack-nerd-font brew install ripgrep fzf brew install efm-langserver lazy-nvim tokyonight lualine barbecue bufferline indent_blankline gitsigns.nvim alpha-nvim nvim-telescope https://github.com/nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter https://github.com/nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter-textobjects https://github.com/neovim/nvim-lspconfig https://github.com/williamboman/mason.nvim https://github.com/hrsh7th/nvim-cmp lsp-format treesitter-playground lazyvim 参考 kickstart nvim 参考 了解 vim text object概念 plugin use https://github.com/junegunn/vim-plug, install this first： sh -c 'curl -fLo "${XDG_DATA_HOME:-$HOME/.local/share}"/nvim/site/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs \ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim' mkdir ~/.config/nvim/ nvim ~/.config/nvim/init.vim cat << EOF > ~/.config/nvim/init.vim call plug#begin('~/.vim/plugged') call plug#end() EOF write Plug 'fatih/vim-go' between call run :PlugInstall vim config is .
